Welcome to The Bifrost's documentation!
=======================================

A bridge to move your data structures across different programming languages
-------------------------------------------------------------------------------------

.. figure:: ../img/icon_bifrost.png
  :width: 300
  :alt: Alternative text


This is an open-source suite of mini-libraries designed to connect array data between Python and C++ through the use of JSON files. 
Python and C++ modules use tojson and jsonload functions to convert [one- two- and three-dimensional] arrays to .json DOK (Dictionary of Keys) and viceversa, respectively



.. figure:: ../img/Google-protocol-buffer.png
  :width: 200
  :alt: Alternative text
  :target: https://github.com/andrewrgarcia/tensorscout


Check out the :doc:`usage` section for further information, including how to :ref:`installation` the project.
